item.title: GitHub Pages and GitHub Actions
item.description: GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages ðŸš€ Deploy static files and publish your site with Static Site Generators peaceiris/actions-gh-pages This is a GitHub Action to deploy your static files to GitHub Pages. This deploy action can be combined simply and freely with Static Site Generators (Hugo, mdBook, MkDocs, Gatsby, GitBook, etc.). - name: Deploy uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: deploy_key: ${{ secrets.ACTIONS_DEPLOY_KEY }} publish_dir: ./public The above example step will deploy ./public directory
